JobTitle: Market Research Manager, Social Media Intelligence
JobFullDesc: Bring your business consulting and analytical skills to advance the Social Media Intelligence and Insights practice at one of the largest technology companies in the world! We are seeking an experienced professional with strong consultation, entrepreneurial and leadership skills to join our Research + Insights team.   About the Team:The Research + Insights team is one of the largest customer insights teams in the world and serves the company’s core businesses. The Social Intelligence Team partners with Research + Insights research mangers and directly with our business partners across the business. Our people are insights professionals with a strong consultative approach, who thrive on tackling significant business opportunities and influencing decision makers at all levels. We are intellectually curious, analytical, impact driven, persistent, and not shy about sharing our opinions and recommendations. And we are passionate about developing ourselves, our careers, and our profession. At Microsoft, we are committed to the mission of helping our customers realize their full potential. We are motivated and inspired every day by how our customers use our software, services, and devices to find creative solutions to business problems, develop breakthrough ideas, and stay connected to what's most important to them.   About the Role:We are looking for a Social Intelligence Research Manager to contribute to the advancement of Microsoft’s discipline of harnessing customer insight from online social media. This is an emerging discipline within Microsoft’s Research + Insights team with a goal to complement traditional primary research methodologies with organic, voice of the customer insight from a large portfolio of social media channels.  This social research manager role will have three primary responsibilities within the overall Social Intelligence Practice.  The first area will focus on utilizing social media data to harvest insights to influence key business decisions for a set of Microsoft’s primary businesses (such as Windows, Teams, and/or Xbox). The second area will focus on managing an innovation agenda to help identify different audiences within social media that are core to Microsoft products and service development. The third, in managing the practice’s social platform strategy, which will include orchestrating enhancements with our social media data provider and query management.ResponsibilitiesPartner with Microsoft marketers and researchers to deliver customer insights to influence key business strategiesLead custom social research projects across a set of key businesses (Windows, Teams, and/or Xbox)Support business and marketing strategies through social intelligence and analyticsDevelop strategic perspectives that drive marketing and business decisions Communicate insights, implications, and recommendations to key stakeholders to provide the organic voice-of-the-customer to support business decisionsUse business strategy engagements to innovate and develop new social research methodologies to bring best-in-class solutions to the team and practicePartner with the broader community of Research + Insights research consultants to identify areas where social insights can act as a complement to or replacement of traditional research methodologies Manage a platform strategy to broaden the identification of consumer and commercial audiences in social media channels Work closely with the Commercial Sales & Marketing team to advance Microsoft’s social platform partnership(s)Identify and onboard new social media data sources to expand our ability to identify new audiences that help Microsoft understand such topics as product experience and customer journeyInnovate on the social query management system utilized by over 2800 Microsoft social marketersQualificationsThe ideal candidate will have at least 2-3 years of experience either leading primary marketing research studies, data analytics, and/or social media analytics. They will have demonstrated expertise at consuming data and insights and utilizing results to inform business strategy. They will have a passion for innovating and the ability to innovate the practice in an entrepreneurial way.    RequiredCritical ThinkingAdvanced critical thinking and problem framing skillsStrong business acumenConsultative approachSocial Marketing/Insights ExperienceBroad understanding of social marketing platforms such as Sprinklr, Brandwatch or Netbase QuidExperience utilizing queries to extract data from these platforms around a broad array of topics and audiencesCross-Organization Collaboration and Influence SkillsExceptional cross-group collaborationExperience formulating and delivering insights and strategic recommendations to business problems in a thoughtful and persuasive manner  PreferredTraditional Primary Research and Analysis ExperienceBroad understanding of primary research methodologies and analytic techniquesExperience analyzing and synthesizing multiple sources of data (e.g., survey, qualitative, telemetry, business metrics, analyst reports) to answer business questionsBasic understanding of social media content and channelsGeneral understanding of Boolean queries and Natural language processing (NLP)Experience with product development and/or GTM strategyBachelor’s degree in marketing, market research, mathematics, statistics, social science or similar strongly preferred.If you don't think you meet all the criteria, but still are interested in the job, please apply.
